tooltip.bidding_method:
Direct: Bidding is done publicly and is visible to all bidders and committees
Closed: Bids submitted are kept confidential until they are opened by the auction committee
tooltip.auctionManager:
The auction manager in the entity is responsible for the final approval of the
auction publication and the follow-up, management and award of the auction
tooltip.start_price: The minimum bid that will be submitted by the bidder
tooltip.guree_percentage: A percentage of the offer value is reserved from the bank to prove the seriousness of the offeror

auction-settings.You-can-manage-the-auction: You can manage the auction from this menu
auction-settings.ManagingAuctions: For help or support in managing auctions

auction-instruction.instructionsList1: 1. Before participating in the auction, the commercial registration status must be “Participant” in the Etimad platform.
auction-instruction.instructionsList2: 2. When the auction starts, you will be required to issue and attach the bid bond, submit your bid, and attach the final bond in case the auction is awarded to you. And you can issue guarantees through the adoption platform -
auction-instruction.instructionsList3: 3. At the start of the auction, the initial guarantee amount will be reserved, after which the bidding can be started, and in the event that the auction is not awarded to the bidder, the bank guarantee will be immediately released.
auction-instruction.instructionsList4: 4. If the minimum estimated price of the products is not met, the auction will not be awarded.
auction-instruction.InitialAward: (initial award) Auction Award on top view

bidderFinalInvoice.AwardCanceled: The award will be canceled if the invoice is not paid within 30 days of awarding.
bidderFinalInvoice.payDetails: A payment invoice has been issued to pay the auction dues, please complete the payment and you will then receive an email to confirm the payment. The award will be canceled if the bill is not paid within 30 days of the award.

bidderSendInvoice.approval_of_the_final_award_title: Approval of the final award and send the invoice ?
bidderSendInvoice.approval_of_the_final_award_desc: When the award is approved and the invoice is sent to complete the payment by the bidder, the auction will be awarded automatically.
bidderSendInvoice.you_will_receive_invoice: You will receive an email when payment has been completed and the auction has been awarded.

popup1.head: Confirmation of Auction Awarding Approval?
popup1.subhead: Upon approval of the award, an invoice will be sent to complete the payment by the bidder, and the auction will be awarded automatically upon completion of the payment.

popup2.head: Are you sure of the rejection of the award?

popup3.head: The award has been rejected and the auction has been successfully cancelled
